components.name: visibility
components.label: Visibility
components.description: This property will eventually replace the 'hidden' property and other properties that toggle visibility on the UI and payload

values.label: Yes (Display in UI and include in payload)
Removed (Remove from UI and exlude from payload)

components.name: defaultValue
components.label: Default Value
components.description: Enter default value of component. (formData, formMode, globalState) are exposed

components.name: entityDisplayProperty
components.label: Display Property
components.description: Name of the property that should be displayed in the autocomplete. Live empty to use default display property defined on the back-end.

components.name: filter
components.label: Entity Filter
components.fieldsUnavailableHint: Please select `Entity Type` to be able to configure this filter.

components.name: allowFreeText
components.label: Allow Free Text
components.description: Allow to use free text that is missing on the source

components.name: onChangeCustom
components.label: On Change
components.description: Enter custom even handler on changing of event. (form, value, option) are exposed. Called when select an option or input value change

components.name: style
components.label: Style
components.description: A script that returns the style of the element as an object. This should conform to CSSProperties

components.name: customVisibility
components.label: Custom Visibility
components.description: Enter custom visibility code.  You must return true to show the component. The global variable data is provided, and allows you to access the data of any form component, by using its API key.

components.name: customEnabled
components.label: Custom Enabled
components.description: Enter custom enabled code.  You must return true to enable the component. The global variable data is provided, and allows you to access the data of any form component, by using its API key.
